Body:
wedge = Wedge(concept='ManyToMany')
Ana = Analyser.FlatAnalyser(position=(0.5, 0, 0), direction=(1, 0, 1))
Det2 = Detector.TubeDetector1D(position=(1.5, 0.1, 1.0), direction=(1.0, 0,
    0), length=0.5, pixels=5, split=[0, 2, 5])
Ana2 = Analyser.FlatAnalyser(position=(0.75, 0, 0), direction=(1, 0, 1))
wedge.append([Det2, Ana, Ana2])
detectorPixelPositions, analyserPixelPositions = (wedge.
    calculateDetectorAnalyserPositions())
DetPixelPos2 = np.array([[[1.3, 0.1, 1], [1.4, 0.1, 1], [1.5, 0.1, 1], [1.6,
    0.1, 1], [1.7, 0.1, 1]]])
assert np.all(DetPixelPos2 == detectorPixelPositions[0])
anapos = np.array([0.5, 0.5, 0.75, 0.75, 0.75])
assert np.all([(analyserPixelPositions[0][i, 0] == anapos[i]) for i in
    range(5)])
